subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: Some wishes were fulfilled when the Celtics finished off the Magic and the Lakers closed out the Suns: a storied rivalry will resume in the finals for the 11th time since the Lakers moved West.
snippet: Some wishes were fulfilled when the Celtics finished off the Magic and the Lakers closed out the Suns: a storied rivalry will resume in the finals for the 11th time since the Lakers moved West.
